headers.content-security-policy: default-src https:; connect-src 'self' https://swapi.co/api/; manifest-src 'self'; font-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://starwars-visualguide.com/assets/img/; object-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self'; form-action 'self'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self';
